trans-unit.source: Serves as the root container for state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: Funge da contenitore radice per i flussi di lavoro stato macchina.

trans-unit.source: Contains event-driven activities and states.
trans-unit.target: Contiene gli Stati e le attività basate sugli eventi.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateMachineWorkflowActivity is an activity container used to create workflows that follow a state machine model.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Il StateMachineWorkflowActivity è un contenitore di attività utilizzato per creare flussi di lavoro che seguono un modello di computer di stato.

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the StateMachineWorkflowActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: È il StateMachineWorkflowActivity un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, ovvero il StateMachineWorkflowActivity può contenere altre attività.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are the only permitted child activities of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: Il StateMachineWorkflowActivity e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>le attività sono le uniche attività figlio consentite del StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are permitted because the root activity itself behaves like a state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>le attività sono consentite perché l'attività radice stessa si comporta come uno stato.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can have <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at the root level that are used by all the State activities in the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, è possibile avere <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>attività a livello di radice utilizzati da tutte le attività di stato di StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at this level provide a global mechanism for processing workflow events and automate state transitions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>le attività a questo livello forniscono un meccanismo globale per l'elaborazione degli eventi del flusso di lavoro e automatizzare le transizioni di stato.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities provide a mechanism to define the various stages in the model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>le attività forniscono un meccanismo per definire le varie fasi nel modello.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity has properties that are required for the execution of the state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: Il StateMachineWorkflowActivity dispone di proprietà che sono necessari per l'esecuzione del flusso di lavoro computer dello stato.

trans-unit.source: Most notably, the StateMachineWorkflowActivity has two properties that are important: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, il StateMachineWorkflowActivity ha due proprietà che sono importanti: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is the state in which the state machine is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>della macchina a stati è lo stato in cui la macchina a stati è quando un'istanza della macchina a stati viene creato.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> property is mandatory and must be provided when a StateMachineWorkflowActivity is created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>proprietà è obbligatoria e deve essere specificata quando viene creato un StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>della macchina a stati è come qualsiasi altra attività di stato contenuta all'interno della macchina a stati.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity root activity and a StateMachineWorkflowActivity can have only one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: L'attività di stato può essere un figlio diretto dell'attività radice StateMachineWorkflowActivity e un StateMachineWorkflowActivity può avere un solo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activity that is designated as the end state of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>del StateMachineWorkflowActivity è un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>attività che è designato come stato finale del StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: Quando si verifica una transizione per il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, viene completata l'esecuzione del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>non è obbligatorio.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a StateMachineWorkflowActivity that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che è possibile avere un StateMachineWorkflowActivity che non è stata completata.

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Ciò non significa che il flusso di lavoro macchina è sempre attivo in memoria.

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: Il StateMachineWorkflowActivity può essere scaricata in quanto attende un evento.

trans-unit.source: StateMachineWorkflowActivity activities that never complete are especially useful in processing long running business transactions, as in the case of a purchase order received by a supplier.
trans-unit.target: Attività StateMachineWorkflowActivity mai completate sono particolarmente utili nell'elaborazione di transazioni di business, come nel caso di un ordine di acquisto ricevuto da un fornitore a esecuzione prolungata.

trans-unit.source: The fact that the purchase order was fulfilled does not mean that the purchase order process is over.
trans-unit.target: Il fatto che è stata eseguita l'ordine di acquisto non significa che il processo di ordine di acquisto viene eseguito su.

trans-unit.source: The goods that are part of the purchase order might be returned or the purchase order might be amended and have additional items added to it after the fulfillment.
trans-unit.target: Le merci che fanno parte dell'ordine di acquisto potrebbero essere restituite o potrebbe essere modificato l'ordine di acquisto e sono elementi aggiuntivi aggiunti dopo l'evasione.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes there might be a requirement to keep the purchase order records for an extended period of time for legal or other purposes.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi potrebbe essere un requisito di conservare l'ordine di acquisto per un lungo periodo di tempo per scopi legali o altri.

trans-unit.source: The fact that a workflow does not finish just means that the workflow remains in an unloaded state.
trans-unit.target: Il fatto che un flusso di lavoro non finisca significa semplicemente che il flusso di lavoro rimane in uno stato scaricato.

trans-unit.source: There may be a case for retiring the workflows, which means that after a set period of time the workflow instance may be forced to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Potrebbe esserci un case per il ritiro dei flussi di lavoro, il che significa che dopo un determinato periodo di tempo l'istanza del flusso di lavoro potrebbe essere necessario arrestare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'attività definita dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la fine <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the CompletedStateName, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: Quando si verifica una transizione per il CompletedStateName, viene completata l'esecuzione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The CompletedStateName is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: Il CompletedStateName non è obbligatorio.

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che è possibile avere un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>che non è stata completata.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Ciò non significa che il flusso di lavoro macchina è sempre attivo in memoria.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>può essere scaricata in quanto attende un evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> and CompletedStateName, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>e CompletedStateName, vedere <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The end <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Fine <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome di attualmente in esecuzione <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentStateName property only returns the name of the current state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà CurrentStateName restituisce solo il nome dello stato corrente quando l'accesso dall'interno del flusso di lavoro, ad esempio, da un gestore del codice in un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>attività.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, and never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà non utilizzata dal codice host perché l'host può accedere solo a una copia della definizione del flusso di lavoro e mai all'albero dell'istanza attiva.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to determine the current state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]come determinare lo stato corrente dall'host, vedere la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that determines whether dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> che determina se è possibile apportare aggiornamenti dinamici nel flusso di lavoro, in caso di override in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> che identifica quando possono essere eseguiti gli aggiornamenti dinamici.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> in cui il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> quando viene creata un'istanza della macchina a stati.

trans-unit.source: The InitialStateName property is mandatory and must be provided when a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is created.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di proprietà InitialStateName è obbligatoria e deve essere specificata quando un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>viene creato.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: The InitialStateName of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà InitialStateName della macchina a stati è come qualsiasi altra attività di stato contenuta all'interno della macchina a stati.

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> root activity and a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> can have only one InitialStateName.
trans-unit.target: L'attività di stato può essere un figlio diretto del <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>attività radice e un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>può avere solo una proprietà InitialStateName.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] InitialStateName and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Proprietà InitialStateName e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, vedere <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> in cui il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> quando viene creata un'istanza della macchina a stati.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the previously executed <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome di eseguita in precedenza <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The PreviousStateName property only returns the name of the previous state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà PreviousStateName restituisce solo il nome dello stato precedente in caso di accesso dall'interno del flusso di lavoro, ad esempio, da un gestore del codice in un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà non utilizzata dal codice host perché l'host ha accesso solo a una copia della definizione del flusso di lavoro e mai all'albero dell'istanza attiva.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to determine the previous state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]come determinare lo stato precedente dall'host, vedere la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the previous <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del precedente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> that is used to change the state of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref> utilizzato per modificare lo stato di un <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo è costante.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
